Detailed Description

The socket namespace contains an implementation independent interface to all socket communication within the framework.

You should simply import sevent/socket.h and use sevent::socket::Facade to work with the socket interface. sevent::socket::Facade::make() creates the currently default socket implementation (a subclass of sevent::socket::Facade).
